info.title: TeamCloud
info.description: API for working with a TeamCloud instance.

license.name: TeamCloud is licensed under the MIT License

202.description: Started creating the new Project. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

409.description: A Project already exists with the name specified in the request body.

get.summary: Gets a Project by Name or ID.

404.description: A Project with the specified Name or ID was not found.

202.description: Starts deleting the specified Project. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: A Project with the specified name or ID was not found.

get.summary: Gets all Tags for a Project.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found.

202.description: Starts creating the new Project Tag. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found.

409.description: A Project Tag already exists with the key provided in the request body.

202.description: Starts updating the Project Tag. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found, or a Tag with the key provided in the request body was not found.

get.summary: Gets a Project Tag by Key.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found, or a Tag with the provided key was not found.

202.description: Starts deleting the Project Tag. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found, or a Tag with the provided key was not found.

409.description: A ProjectType already exists with the ID provided in the request body.

404.description: A Project Type with the ID provided in the request body could not be found.

get.summary: Gets a Project Type by ID.

404.description: A ProjectType with the projectTypeId provided was not found.
A ProjectType with the projectTypeId provided was not found.

get.summary: Gets all Users for a Project.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found.

202.description: Starts creating the new Project User. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found, or a User with the email address provided in the request body was not found.

409.description: A Project User already exists with the email address provided in the request body.

202.description: Starts updating the Project UserProject. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found, or a User with the ID provided in the request body was not found.

get.summary: Gets a Project User by ID or email address.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found, or a User with the provided identifier was not found.

202.description: Starts deleting the Project User. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found, or a User with the provided identifier was not found.

202.description: Starts creating the new Provider. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

409.description: A Provider already exists with the ID provided in the request body.

202.description: Starts updating the provided Provider. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: A Provider with the ID provided in the reques body was not found.

200.description: Returns a DataResult with the Provider as the data value.

404.description: A Provider with the providerId provided was not found.

202.description: Starts deleting the provided Provider. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: A Provider with the provided providerId was not found.

get.summary: Gets the status of a long-running operation.

202.description: The long-running operation is running. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: The long-running operation with the trackingId provided was not found.

get.summary: Gets the status of a long-running operation.

202.description: The long-running operation is running. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: The long-running operation with the trackingId provided was not found.

post.summary: Creates a new TeamCloud User as an Admin.

202.description: Starts creating the new TeamCloud User as an Admin. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found, or a User with the email address provided in the request body was not found.

409.description: A TeamCloud User already exists with the email address provided in the request body.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found.
The TeamCloud instance was not found.
The TeamCloud instance was not found.

get.summary: Gets all Tags for a TeamCloud Instance.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found.

202.description: Starts creating the new TeamCloud Tag. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found.

409.description: A TeamCloud Tag already exists with the key provided in the request body.

202.description: Starts updating the TeamCloud Tag. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found, or a Tag with the key provided in the request body was not found.

get.summary: Gets a TeamCloud Tag by Key.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found, or a Tag with the provided key was not found.

202.description: Starts deleting the TeamCloud Tag. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found, or a Tag with the provided key was not found.
The TeamCloud instance was not found.

202.description: Starts creating the new TeamCloud User. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found, or a User with the email address provided in the request body was not found.

409.description: A User already exists with the email address provided in the request body.

202.description: Starts updating the TeamCloud User. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: A User with the ID provided in the request body was not found.

get.summary: Gets a TeamCloud User by ID or email address.

404.description: A User with the provided identifier was not found.

202.description: Starts deleting the TeamCloud User. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: A User with the identifier provided was not found.
